AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: referred to as the Government, party in the legal case
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Court: held a hearing and entered an opinion and order in Federico Saldana's case
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Williamson County Sheriff's Office: Employer of detectives Gary Haston, Heather Vargas, and Deputy Jason Cox, involved in drug interdiction cases and utilized a K-9 unit for searches
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jason Cox: Deputy who initiated the traffic stop on Interstate 35 and handled paperwork for the stop
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Heather Vargas: Detective involved in providing traffic violation information and present at the scene after the stop, participated in searching vehicles
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Federico Saldana: Individual stopped by Jason Cox, admitted to prior arrests for smuggling illegal aliens and drugs, served 9 years in federal prison
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Gary Haston: Detective who interrogated Federico Saldana about potential drug trafficking and conducted searches with a K-9 unit
